alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County; Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 28 at 3:14AM PST until December 31 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible with total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches above 4000 feet and 6 to 12 inches above 6000 feet. * WHERE...Lincoln County, Sheep Range and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...From early Wednesday morning through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and dangerous travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The primary concerns will be along Highway 95 north of Las Vegas and Highway 93 through Lincoln County where accumulating snowfall on the roadway may result in dangerous travel conditions. Additional areas of concern include State Route 319 and Beaver Dam Road east of Highway 93, and State Routes 156, 157, and 158 in the Spring Mountains.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Lincoln County; Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
